articles.description: Atlanta Braves news and notes from Friday recap Orlando Arcia’s clutch performance, AJ Smith-Shawver’s first career start, and more. Then, transactions, injury updates, and more from around the league.
articles.content: The Atlanta Braves pulled off another late-inning comeback to defeat the Washington Nationals 3-2 on Friday night and extend their win streak to six games. Heading into this matchup, AJ Smith-Shawver… [+1979 chars]
